content:
I don't have personal preferences, but here are some popular thai dishes that you might want to consider trying at the lime leaf thai restaurant in basingstoke:

1. tom yum soup – a spicy soup made with shrimps, lemongrass, chili, and lime juice. 2. pad thai – a stir-fried noodle dish with peanuts, bean sprouts, and tofu or meat. 3. massaman curry – a mild curry with potatoes, peanuts and meat or vegetables. 4. green curry – a spicy curry with coconut milk, kaffir lime, and vegetables or meat. 5. papaya salad – a spicy salad made with shredded papaya, chili, peanuts, and lime juice. 6. mango sticky rice – a sweet dessert made with sticky rice, fresh mango, and coconut milk. these dishes are loved by many thai cuisine enthusiasts and can be a great starting point for your dining experience at the lime leaf thai restaurant. of course, there are many other dishes on the menu that you might also enjoy. don't hesitate to ask the staff for recommendations regarding their most popular or outstanding dishes.
